snippet: RICE--Margaret C.,on Friday, December 25, 2015. Beloved mother of the late Douglas B. Rice. Devoted mother-in-law of Denise V. Jones Rice and grandmother of Demetrius C. and David W. Rice. Services at Stewart Funeral Home, 4001 Benning Road NE, Washington, DC on Saturday, January 2, 2016 from 1pm until service at 2pm. Online condolences may be made at: www. stewartfuneralhome.com. 1/3

Rice. Services at Stewart Funeral Home, 4001 Benning Road NE, Washington, DC on Saturday, January 2, 2016 from 1pm until service at 2pm. headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  RICE, MARGARET C.
